                          GridPlotterGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.kzoo.grid.display.GridDisplay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class GridPlotterGUI
extends edu.kzoo.grid.gui.GridAppFrame

Grid Plotter:
The GridPlotterGUI class provides the graphical user interface for a program that draws in a grid by placing color blocks in its cells.

Version:
1 September 2004
Author:
Alyce Brady (based on code by Julie Zelenski)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

GridPlotterGUI

public GridPlotterGUI(int maxDelayMSecs,
                      int minDelayMsecs)
Constructs the graphical user interface for the Grid Plotter program.

Parameters:
maxDelayMsecs - longest delay value for slider, in milliseconds
minDelayMsecs - shortest delay value for slider, in milliseconds

showLocation

public void showLocation(edu.kzoo.grid.Location loc)
Shows the contents of a single location in the grid. This allows for speedier display than the showGrid method because it only updates the contents of the one, specified location. (Precondition: must have called setGrid.)
